strapiPost.title: Kim's Convenience Takes the Stage At TheatreSquared
strapiPost.content:
Coming to TheatreSquared, the hilarious Korean-Canadian comedy Kim's Convenience by Ins Choi will run from Jan 25 to Feb 19.

  • The preshow: You might recognize the show from the award-winning comedy series on Netflix, but before it hit the screens, Kim's Convenience had its start on the stage.
  • Major props: Director Nelson Eusebio is excited to share this story that resonates deeply with him as an Asian American son of immigrants, and critics like the Toronto Star have said, "It's the kind of show that restores one's faith in the theatre."

Tickets range from $20-$54 and can be purchased HERE.
